transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha good morning sir, India Mart se bol raha thank you.
Customer: Aaji aap log jayega kaise sir aap
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm boliye.
Customer: Main ye keh raha tha ki ek baar online aate na ek baar guide kar deta na service ko thoda sa proper tarike se aur kaise use kar sakte hain.
Executive: Kya online kya aayega bolo.
Customer: Wo lead manager vagarah hai na abhi dekh rahe hain ki use nahi kar pa rahe hain aap acche se.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Online aa sakte hain video meeting mein.
Executive: Ha boliye na abhi main bolo lead manager mein aaya.
Executive: Hmm lead manager mein aaya aap?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Lead manager mein jo bhi by lead inquiry aap bhej rahe ho na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. Usko na waha se na lead manager mein jaake na waha se reply karna aap. Aur call agar lagana bhi hoga na buyer ko to wahi se dekho lead manager mein kisi by lead jo bhi use karte ho na uska contact detail na lead manager mein jaake save ho jaata hai.
Customer: Waha se theek hai wahi pe mera dusri call aa raha hai main phone kar raha hu aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs guidance on using lead manager.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use lead manager.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- lead manager, buyleads, online guidance
